attributes.action: Provide funding for 2 year old children who's parents work but struggle to pay.
attributes.additional_details: Provide 15 hours free funding for 2 year old children who's families work.
attributes.background:
My Husband and I work, between us we do 60 plus hours a week-as with many families. Now our child is at the age she can start 2's nursery we will be looking at £600 plus a month.
If either of us were to not work we would get this for free! You are putting families in this bracket into hardship.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  We're not sure if you want free childcare for all 2 year olds, or just for those who cannot afford childcare.  There are already provisions for people in receipt of certain benefits:

https://www.gov.uk/help-with-childcare-costs/free-childcare-2-year-olds

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
